item.title: Hide IDE folders in git using a global gitignore
item.author: felix.niederwanger@suse.de (phoenix)
item.description: Integrated development environemnts (IDE) are using their own folders within your code repositories to store their settings. This can become annoying when working on a git repository and they keep popping up as untracked files:
